message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $110.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to think about my costs. I can do $115, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for considering my perspective, Alice. I am willing to pay $112 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $118, but that's as low as I can go. I think we're getting close to a deal.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $116 for it.
I'm not sure how much lower I can go, Bob. I think we're really close to a deal. I can do $119, but that's as low as I can go. Let's finalize this.
Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $117 for it.
